attributes.action: Grant indefinite leave to remain to all overseas NHS workers forthwith.
attributes.additional_details: It would be shameful to have them risk their lives for us only to require them to leave or to deport them at a later date. Let us really say thank you and at the same time make some worthwhile amends for the Windrush scandal.
attributes.background: The government has today announced a one year extension of stay to 3000 overseas employees in the NHS whose stay was nearing expiry, by way of thanks for their help with the Covid-19 pandemic.Whilst this is welcome, we should go beyond that and grant indefinite leave to remain to them all.
